Title: Fans of Wet Circles
Writer: Douglas Adams (based upon the novels by), Max Landis (created for television by), Russel Friend, Garrett Lerner, Sinead Daly (executive story editor), Molly Nussbaum (story editor)
Actors: Samuel Barnett, Elijah Wood, Hannah Marks, Jade Eshete
Plot: Dirk, Todd and Farah are back together and investigating a new case. They discover a body that is linked to a cold case.
